TopicTitle: Wing mouse looks like a good option.

Articles.Content:
Just got some spam about this 3D mouse, it looks pretty damn cool for KSP.

http://www.pcauthority.com.au/News/374601,wing-the-next-generation-of-the-mouse.aspx
And if I remember correctly, Squad is working on 3D mouse support.

Too bad they're not considering the brushed aluminum finish for the final product. It would go perfectly with my Cooler Master Cosmos case: http://images.bit-tech.net/content_images/2007/08/coolermaster_cosmos/b30.jpg

Not that that would be the primary consideration... not at all.
